title: man detective: medium skin tone
category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
description: The Male Sleuth, Type-4 emoji is a sequence of the  Sleuth or Spy,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-4, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selec
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man detective with medium skin tone stands alert, clad in a classic trench coat and fedora, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading for a tactile feel. His expression, subtly conveyed through a hint of shadow and sharp detail, suggests keen observation and a quest for truth, embodying mystery and investigation. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for signaling a puzzle, a secret, or a need for detective work.
